Uses of Interface
xxl.core.io.Convertable

  • Packages that use Convertable 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager
    Provides a decorator container that is able to store records (of type Block ) which are of different size.
    xxl.core.collections.queues.io
    The package xxl.core.collections.queues.io provides some implementations of the queue datastructure using special containers (BlockBasedQueue), files (FileStackQueue) or streams (StreamQueue) for storing and receiving the data.
    xxl.core.indexStructures
    Provides important index structures like B-trees, R-trees, M-trees and bulk-loading-algorithms.
    xxl.core.io
    Provides classes and routines for system input and output through data streams, serialization, raw i/o and a FAT file system.
    xxl.core.io.converters
    This package provides a larger collection of converters, e.g. a complete collection of converters for the primitive data types, strings and arrays of these types.
    xxl.core.spatial
    Support data types and building-blocks for spatial, temporal and mining algorithms (e.g. similarity joins)
    xxl.core.spatial.geometries.cursors
    A collection of spatial queries.
    xxl.core.spatial.histograms.utils  
    xxl.core.spatial.points
    Implemetns the base type Point for all data that deals with points of arbitrary dimensions and wrappers for double[], float[] and fixed-mantissa points.
    xxl.core.spatial.rectangles
    Implemetns the base type Rectangle for high-dimensional rectangle objects (hyper-cubes) and extentions for different coordinate types (double, float, long).
    xxl.core.util
    This package provides miscellaneous utility classes that don't belong strictly to an other xxl-package.

    • Uses of Convertable in xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager

      Subinterfaces of Convertable in xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Strategy
      An interface for the strategies used by the Recordmanager.
      interface  TIdManager
      A class that implements this interface allows to translate/map a special kind of identifier into tupel identifyers.
      Classes in xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager that implement Convertable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractStrategy
      Abstract implementation of a Strategy which is useful for most of the implemented strategies.
      class  AppendOnlyNStrategy
      This class provides a append only strategy which searches inside the last n allocated pages.
      class  AppendOnlyStrategy
      This class provides a append only strategy.
      class  BestFitOnNEmptiestPagesStrategy
      This class provides a strategy which makes a best fit search inside pages which have the most free space.
      class  BestFitStrategy
      This class provides the best-fit stratey for the record manager.
      class  DecoratorTesterStrategy
      This class makes some consistency checks before forwarding the calls to another strategy.
      class  FirstFitStrategy
      This class provides the first-fit-strategy for the record-manager.
      class  HybridAONFStrategy 
      class  HybridBFOEStrategy 
      class  HybridStrategy 
      class  IdentityTIdManager
      This class implements the TIdManager interface and always returns the same Object (identity).
      class  LastToFirstFitStrategy
      This class provides a last-to-first-fit-strategy for the record-manager.
      class  LRUStrategy 
      class  MapTIdManager
      This class implements a TIdManager which uses a main memory HashMap to store the relationship between external identifyers (of type Long) and tuple identifyers inside the record manager.
      class  NextFitStrategy
      This class provides the next-fit stratey for the record manager.
      class  NextFitWithHStrategy
      This class provides a next-fit strategy for the record manager.
      class  NextFitWithHWStrategy
      This class provides a next-fit strategy for the record manager.
      class  OneRecordPerPageStrategy
      This class provides one record per page strategy.
      class  Page
      This class represents a page that can contain multiple records.
      class  RecordManager
      This class is an extension of Container which implements a record manager on top of a given Container.

    • Uses of Convertable in xxl.core.collections.queues.io

      Classes in xxl.core.collections.queues.io that implement Convertable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BlockBasedQueue
      This class provides a queue that uses a container for storing blocks of serialized data.
      Fields in xxl.core.collections.queues.io with type parameters of type Convertable 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Function<Object,RandomAccessFileQueue<Convertable>> RandomAccessFileQueue.FACTORY_METHOD
      A factory method to create a new RandomAccessFileQueue (see contract for FACTORY_METHOD in interface Queue).

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Sphere
      This class implements a Descriptor that is a sphere.

    • Uses of Convertable in xxl.core.io

      Methods in xxl.core.io with parameters of type Convertable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int Convertables.write(File outputFile, Convertable convertable)
      Writes a convertable object to the given file and returns the number of written objects.
      static int Convertables.write(String outputFile, Convertable convertable)
      Writes a convertable object to the file with the given name and returns the number of written objects.

    • Uses of Convertable in xxl.core.io.converters

      Classes in xxl.core.io.converters with type parameters of type Convertable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConvertableConverter<T extends Convertable>
      This class provides a converter that is able to read and write objects that implements the Convertable interface.
      Fields in xxl.core.io.converters with type parameters of type Convertable 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ConvertableConverter<Convertable> ConvertableConverter.DEFAULT_INSTANCE
      This instance can be used for getting a default instance of a convertable converter.
      Methods in xxl.core.io.converters that return Convertable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Convertable Converters.readSingleObject(File file, Convertable object)
      Reads a single convertable object from the given file and returns it.
      Methods in xxl.core.io.converters with parameters of type Convertable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Convertable Converters.readSingleObject(File file, Convertable object)
      Reads a single convertable object from the given file and returns it.
      static int Converters.sizeOf(Convertable convertable)
      Returns the number of bytes needed to serialize the state (the attributes) of the specified convertable object.
      static byte[] Converters.toByteArray(Convertable convertable)
      Creates a newly allocated byte array that contains the serialization of the spezified convertable object.
      static void Converters.writeSingleObject(File file, Convertable object)
      Writes a single convertable object to the given file.

      A DistanceWeightedKPE wraps KPE-objects and additionally contains information on the distance of the KPE-descriptor from some query-object.

    • Uses of Convertable in xxl.core.spatial.points

      Subinterfaces of Convertable in xxl.core.spatial.points 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Point
      An interface for points.
      Classes in xxl.core.spatial.points that implement Convertable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractPoint
      An "implementation" of the Point interface.
      class  DoublePoint
      A Wrapper for double[]-points that provides useful methods on points like e.g. a conversion mechanism.
      class  FixedPoint
      A Wrapper for Fixed-Mantissa-Points.
      class  FloatPoint
      A Wrapper for float[]-points that provides useful methods on points.
      class  NumberPoint<T extends Number>
      A Wrapper for Number[]-points that provides useful methods on points like e.g. a conversion mechanism.

    • Uses of Convertable in xxl.core.spatial.rectangles

      Subinterfaces of Convertable in xxl.core.spatial.rectangles 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Rectangle
      A high-dimensional Rectangle (=hyper-cube).
      Classes in xxl.core.spatial.rectangles that implement Convertable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DoublePointRectangle
      A high-dimensional Rectangle (=hyper-cube) extends the abstract class Rectangle the value at each dimension should be of the type "double"
      class  FixedPointRectangle
      A high-dimensional Rectangle (=hyper-cube) extends the abstract class Rectangle the value at each dimension should be of the type "long"
      class  FloatPointRectangle
      A high-dimensional Rectangle (=hyper-cube) extends the abstract class Rectangle the value at each dimension should be of the type "float"

    • Uses of Convertable in xxl.core.util

      Classes in xxl.core.util that implement Convertable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BitSet
      This class is a replacement for java.util.BitSet which neither implements the interfaces Convertable nor Comparable.
      class  LongIdGenerator
      Handles identifyers which can be used for a lot of reasons.
